statements: UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET is_fraudulent = true WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-01-15 09:00:00' WHERE amount > 500.00;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = NOW() WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE amount < 500;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE transactions SET customer_id = 5678 WHERE transaction_id = 4321;
UPDATE fraud_attempts SET fraud_reason = 'Credit card theft' WHERE attempt_id = 9876;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount - 50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
UPDATE fraud_attempts SET fraud_reason = 'Stolen card used for transaction' WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 200);
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE fraud_patterns SET is_active = true WHERE pattern_id = 3;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE amount > 1000;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE account_type = 'savings';
UPDATE fraud_patterns SET is_active = false WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%fraud%' AND is_active = true;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE merchants SET merchant_location = 'New Location' WHERE merchant_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.1 WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
